title: Blue Ocean Strategy Formulation
description: An agent must analyze a competitive market and suggest a 'Blue Ocean' strategy to create uncontested market space.

tasks.description: Analyze documents describing the current state of the 'fast food' industry, identifying the key factors of competition (e.g., 'price', 'speed', 'menu variety').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the industry's standard competitive factors.

tasks.description: Using the Eliminate-Reduce-Raise-Create framework, propose changes to these factors. For example, 'Eliminate complex menus', 'Raise food quality'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies the framework to suggest strategic shifts.

tasks.description: Synthesize these changes into a new value proposition for a 'fast-casual, high-quality burger' restaurant, representing a new market space.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent describes a coherent new business concept.
